name: Ikonei Island: An Earthlock Adventure
description: Explore a diverse island, from dense jungles to snowy peaks. Harvest resources, craft gear to keep monsters at bay. Sneak into pirate camps to free captured creatures, who will become powerful allies. Create a home, tend to your farm and make the island your own. Ikonei is fully in your hands!

name: Beach Games
description:
Beach Games is a sports game from critically-acclaimed developer Donut Games.
Hit the beach and master five different sports.

name: Clash of Beasts
description: A beast fantasy world calls. Ancient lore, titanic beasts, and strange elements, all worth a fortune. You are a mercenary carrying the Beastmaster's spark in your blood. Will you master the tactic of beast warfare and defend your base from the villain and bring peace to the world?

name: Build Cars with Edward and Arthur
description: In this game your child can create thousands of unique, crazy and fantastical cars and then test-drive them on the race track.

name: SGS Spain at War
description: The complete Spanish Civil War from July 1936 to April 1939, with all units, weapons and events included on a weekly base. The most complete strategy game made on this conflict. Fight for your ideals, and take control of Spain!

name: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
description: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

name: Give the People What They Want
description: A VR Game where you take on odd jobs, become your ideal self, and throw things at customers' faces.

name: Green Wounds
description: Craft, manage resources, fight enemies, and explore the unknown in this medieval RPG.

name: Welcome to the Backrooms
description: There must be an exit somewhere. Keep your wits about you as you traverse a seemingly endless labyrinth of dingy yellow walls and moldy carpet. Find candy bars and almond water to keep your strength, and stay out of the shadows to keep your sanity.

name: The Complex: Found Footage
description:
Experience the liminal world of the backrooms through a VHS camera, immersing into a mysterious story and wandering the dream-like structures... Might there be something following you?

The Complex: Found Footage is a walking simulator with the world being viewed through a VHS camera. Uncover a mystery that lies in the world of "The Complex", though it may leave more questions rather than answers...

name: Bitlands
description: Platform across strange, magical terrain while meeting even stranger friends and enemies! Discover the history behind the Bitlands, and unlock new allies and powers to traverse the dangerous worlds of the Bitlands, and restore peace to a broken kingdom.

name: Froggo Swing 'n Grapple
description: Froggo Swing 'n Grapple is a retro platformer game about a little frog on an adventure. Swing 'n grapple through the stages with Froggo's powerful and sticky tongue!

name: The Forgotten Demons
description: The Forgotten Demons is a 2D, top-down, dungeon crawler, packed with fierce enemies, powerful spells, multiple unique weapons and more.

name: Remote Life 2: Fearless
description: "Remote Life 2" is a sci-fi an action packed platformer. Combat against scary aliens and escape from the monster Hive. After the success of the first "Remote Life", now you can enjoy even more of the crazy weapons, cool vehicles and outstanding and unique art of Mario Malagrino.

name: Super Hamster Havoc
description: Super Hamster Havoc is a twin-stick arena shooter about a war between hamsters and rats.

name: Super Kiwi 64
description: Super Kiwi 64 is a 3D-Platformer and Collect-a-Thon, in a low poly late 90s console look.

name: Kojimachi Island
description: Kojimachi is a widget style pet game where you can feed and care for your pet on the island you decorate.

name: Hunyadi Strategy
description: Hunyadi is a hexagonal strategy game based on a historical character John Hunyadi from the 15th Century. He was one of the greatest military mind of his age. He lead military campaigns mostly against the rising Ottoman empire.

name: The hardest game in the universe 2
description: The sequel to the most impossible game. The new 2D adventure, embark on this platform game that will test your skill of how much patience you are capable of,New mechanic, 10,000 kills, if you lose your game will be erased, What is the way to make a sequel to an extremely difficult game???

name: Escape the Backrooms
description: You've fallen into the backrooms and now need to find a way to escape. Traverse through eerie procedurally generated levels while avoiding entities and other danger.

name: It Came From Within
description: Something crawled up the kitchen sink drain. Now it is your responsibility. Make choices that will affect its growth in this short disturbing first-person psychological horror walking simulator.

name: Findme: 30sai no Yume Ooibito
description: It is a Japanese visual novel game. It is a game to read texts. Enjoy the story of anguish, conflict, dreams and hope. There is no branching depending on the choices, but you can have a rich story experience like a movie.

name: Venice Master
description: Become a craftsman in the Renaissance Venice. Develop business after business, be resourceful and creative. Many tasks can be completed only if you construct the most suitable machines first. No need to give it any more thought, just roll up your sleeves and get to work!

name: Worm Slayer
description: Worm Slayer is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Roguelike where you must fight your way through the dungeon that is the Worm King's den to finally reach and then defeat the Worm King.

name: Echoes of Mayhem
description: Echoes of Mayhem is a roguelite arpg souls-like. You'll fight through a procedural dungeon of monsters and bosses in an attempt to reforge the world. You'll score loot along the way and gather resources to upgrade your town and unlock new tiers of items and abilities.

name: Voice from Beyond
description: Voice from Beyond is a short, first-person exploration game. You have crashed an old WW2 fighter plane somewhere in the mountains. The place is abandoned, but there are some strange activities in the area. Search the place and find what is going on. It is a route to your rescue.

name: Smooth Operators 2
description: Welcome back to Smooth Operators 2! Smooth Operators is an advanced simulation where you take control of a customer service company and lead it to financial success! Hire employees and customize your buildings with different types of offices, facilities and accessories!

name: Top Town
description: Top Town is an upcoming life simulation game. Create a character and define your own goals and identity by choosing a profession and hobbies. Buy your dream house, visit stores and explore in a persistent and reactive world.

name: Unsleepable
description: "Unsleepable" is a 3D horror game with a suspense story. The main character -- Mike Sorris ,had to find out the truth in this village, and leave the village.

name: Relicborn
description: Relicborn is a story-driven platformer game that tells the story of Alice, a young dressmaker who finds herself in an undiscovered world, searching for a distant, long lost possibility. ARPG elements, fantasy environments, legendary loot, a skill system along with many secrets to be discovered!

name: Byte the Bullet
description: Get into my infected computer and restore every virus-ridden system by recovering game attributes like color or save functions. Enjoy this parody of multiple classic games from 80s & 90s.

name: House of Weirdos
description: a parody of cheap indie horror games.

name: The Castle of Time
description: This is a fighting platformer with a dynamic combat system where you have to fight enemies with your sword.

name: Knight Crawlers
description: Knight Crawlers is a dungeon crawling ARPG with physics based ragdoll combat. Each crawl is made unique through dozens of skill cards to choose from. Hunt for loot, craft powerful equipment, and fight your way back home through strange worlds. How deep can you crawl through the endless realms?

name: Even Heroes Die
description: Race to find the cure to your mortal illness in this roguelike Metroidvania hybrid.

name: Synthwave Racers
description: Race at hypersonic speeds through retro-inspired courses in Synthwave RacersⓇ, an indie-arcade racing game with melodic 80's-inspired synthwave tracks, and tight percision-based action racing gameplay.

name: Squamations
description: Squamations is a relaxing yet fast paced word game you can play at your own speed!

name: Balance Knight
description: Balance Knight is a game in which the player must advance up a scaffolding shaken by physics.

name: Gastro Force
description: The player takes the role of the last soldier of the highly specialized "Gastro Force", elite troopers trained to infiltrate the enormous alien guts to fight them from the inside!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Heartless Lullaby
description: Experience Vampire: The Masquerade in a new way through this isometric cRPG. Change perspectives as you travel through the Heartless Club as a Human and a Vampire. Roll the dice, take your choices, and embrace the night in this narrative prologue.

name: SoulShards Arena
description: SoulShards Arena is an upcoming multiplayer game inspired by MMORPGs PvP modes. In teams of 3 players, defeat your opponents through powerful spells. But beware, as the Winds of Magic can be capricious ...

name: Dungeon Run
description: I wanted to see how much RPG elements can I add into a running platform game. Lol It looks like quiet a lot. The game has randomized map generation. Player is equipped with a sword and magic to devastate monsters. Level up your skills using XP and coins. All this while you never stop running!

name: Fantasy Fishing Town
description: Welcome to Fantasy Fishing Town! Cute pixel graphic x side scroll fishing. It's a unique pleasure! Legendary fish! You're mine!

name: Frisson
description: Frisson is a top-down single-player game that places you in the seat of a sadistic game-maker that forces people in an arena to make them fight to the death until only one person remains. Watch as they interact with the world and forms strategies to survive.

name: Thwackity Puttz
description:
Time to putt for success, as you aim to complete each of the 9 holes in each round of Thwackity Puttz golf.
Somewhat similar to most Golf games, Points are scored based on how many hits you have remaining at the end of each hole, with extra points awarded for hitting a birdie or eagle.

name: Help Newton
description: In this game, the opportunity is offered for you to help Newton to gain inspirations for his work. In every scene Newton goes, an apple is given by the apple sprite. You need to lead the apple to pass all the obstacles to reach Newton. The game world is based on the simulation of classical physics, which is founded by Newton's theory. All the funs you have to discover in game.

name: Sarkwo
description: Slide marbles by swiping on a screen and guide them to their goals.

name: Where's my geek?
description: Have fun identifying parodies of celebrities, discovering fully detailed scenes and a lot of humour.

name: Rhom Bus
description: New, addictive and clever game mechanics in a beautiful and carefully designed world of rhombuses. Turn the tiles or turn the board to complete the levels and help the animals getting on the bus.

name: Dottania
description:
Each protagonist has a different goal, which is not only to develop the town, but also to listen to the needs of the residents. You can also enjoy mini-games such as fishing.
In addition, each country has a different culture and a different landscape depending on the lords you choose.

name: Cargo Bridge 2
description:
Cargo Bridge is back. Build bridges and test your construction skills — Now with more levels, more bridge connections, more cargo and more fun!
Design a blueprint of a bridge and test it when you are done! The game's workers will then try to cross your masterpiece to pick up cargo from the other side of the valley and bring it back. Your goal is to collect all items in each level.

name: Active Soccer 2
description:
The most awaited football game sequel is now available!!!
Active Soccer 2 is an innovative top-view arcade football game providing a fast paced arcade experience implementing an amazing playability and easy to learn - hard to master responsive controls.

name: Bad Soccer Manager
description: Lots of minigames are hidden within the game that need to be completed. The more you complete the higher the morale. The higher the morale? The more attacking chances you earn on a match day. If your team love you then they will work like a dog to win at all costs!

name: Draw Rider 2 Plus
description: Welcome to Draw Rider 2 - fun arcade racing games in which both time trips and special missions are waiting for you.

name: Sinless: Remastered
description:
Sinless is a unique combination of a classic point n' click and visual novel with many references and inspirations from classics of the genre, such as Snatcher, or Rise of the Dragon. Add to that custom, inhouse designed lightning and parallax effects, along with a dedicated awesome Soundtrack and original storyline, we hope you will enjoy your stay!
Planned out as a trilogy, experience the first episode also known as the Reveal, which will be followed by Revolution and Revelations accordingly.

name: Rugby League Live 2: Gold Edition
description:
Experience all the emotion and adrenaline of world class Rugby League from quick match through to international competition, as you play your way to becoming a real superstar!
Realism takes over as you’re propelled into the on-field experience through advanced life-like graphics, as you dominate the field with a selection of over 100 teams, you can almost smell the sweat of being in the action.

name: One Life
description: One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and you.

name: Heart Abyss
description: In a world where there is an eternal war between the unions of the human race and beastmen, accidental deaths and slave trade are not rare. But what happens if two slaves by chance unite and survive together, being wanted? Leon and Ray are one of those.

name: Retro Winter Sports 1986
description:
Participate in the 1986 winter sports tournament and compete against other world-class athletes for international recognition.
Six different, action-packed events await you in a beautiful retro-style winter setting. Choose the country you want to represent from 12 different nations.

name: Swap Heroes
description: Swap Heroes is a casual turn-based strategy adventure. Form a group of heroes and guide them in battle through levels of increasingly difficult enemies. Only the strongest and most coordinated parties will survive the danger that lies ahead!

name: Defenders of Kingdom
description: Once upon a time Asgardia is a peaceful kingdom, but that all changed after Shadom nation’s attack and plundering all of Asgardian resources, 2 years later senator of Asgardia began to create various tower to defend the kingdom and finally success to hold shadom nation’s cruelty.

name: Dream Travel Agency!
description: You'll get to see Busan(in Korea) from a different point of view while searching for hidden jewels in Busan. Feel the excitement of a trip to Busan to be rediscovered by fun game.

name: Ploppy Pairs
description: A card matching game for everyone! What makes Ploppy Pairs special is the SharePlay functionality, which lets you play with friends and family together via FaceTime and makes you feel as if you are all in the same place.

name: Puzzle Putt
description: Shaun's off to play a relaxing round of mini golf, but there's a problem... the course is littered with obstacles and it looks like those unruly pigs have been digging up the greens! Help Shaun crack the course by solving fiendish puzzles and building creative constructions to beat the holes. Can you complete all 8 courses and finish under par?

name: The Football Playbook: Tactical Puzzles
description: The Football Playbook is a collection of tactical puzzles. In each puzzle you are presented with a snapshot of a football match. To successfully complete the puzzle you must score a goal. Use a combination of timing, movement and key passes to get your players into a scoring position.

name: Stranger Things: Puzzle Tales
description: Dive into supernatural mysteries and immerse yourself in brand new, original storylines starring your favorite characters from the Netflix series while you explore a new Puzzle RPG experience!

name: Monopoly Tycoon
description: Welcome to the Monopoly Tycoon game! You have been selected by Mr. MONOPOLY to show your full potential and become the ultimate real estate tycoon! Are you up to the challenge? The citizens are waiting for you!

name: Max Bradshaw and the Zombie Invasion
description: Meet Max Bradshaw, intrepid adventurer and all around hero. Then help him save the world from a zombie invasion in this modern action adventure game designed to bring back some of those classic gaming feelings.

name: Fragment's Note 2
description: Fragment's Note 2 is a slice-of-life visual novel/dating sim featuring Kyoichi Akikawa, a boy who lost his family in an airplane accident, the heroines close to him, and the story that binds them together.

name: Galactic Nemesis
description: Aliens are invading the galaxies and you're the only hope. Battle waves of alien races and defeat mega bosses with your powerful galactic ship. Each world offers a new set of challenges, and new species of fire shooting aliens. Upgrade your ship to help your conquer the challenges. Compete in almost 50 stages, then attempt each world's endurance mode to see if you have what it takes to save each galaxy.

name: Meiro Master
description: Now is your time to become the ultimate Meiro Master. Earn your way in to the history books and fulfill your childhood dreams of becoming the unrivalled Meiro Master.

name: Terrovox
description: Explore a huge world. You can go in any direction. Get resources. Craft weapons and items. Create buildings. Use your imagination to the maximum.

name: Leviathan: Streams of Legends
description: Command your army (composed of your Twitch viewers) in this new legendary Social Real Time Strategy game. Bond with your audience in unprecedented ways where you control the war, while they fight each battle from their phones.

name: Panmorphia: Awakened
description: A point and click, puzzle adventure game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the Amulet and transform into one of the four animals that represent the four elements. Each change also brings a unique perspective of the world.

name: Escape from the Trap World
description: Help our friend Hatdevil to get back to his world, passing through a world full of deadly traps.

name: My Dragon Party
description: Every few hundred years a group of friends gathers for a party where they eat, play games, share their stories, drink and have fun. What interesting stories can they tell us this time? Let's find out!

name: Perish Song
description: Perish Song is a 2D action rogue-lite. Traverse through different environments as you battle unique enemies and bosses. Discover the secrets of the world as you dash and blast through anything standing in your path. Each death is an opportunity to learn, adapt, and overcome.

name: Imbalance
description: A fast-paced roguelike shooter with a strong focus on deckbuilding and talent synergies.It fuzes together the dynamic of Doom and thoughtful gameplay and tons of replayability of Slay the Spire.

name: Battle Support
description: This is a 2d war game where players can use the support in the column below to support ground troops. Players can obtain various parts to upgrade their army by completing a game, making the army stronger and winning!

name: Final Stardust: Cosmic Nexus
description: Choose your element and awaken your elemental abilities! Build your deck, create bonds with many Elementalists and engage in fast-paced battles against AI! Enjoy the Final Stardust universe with an amazing single player experience, all in stunning 2D anime like graphics!

name: Meridiana: A demon's madness
description: You take on the role of Meridiana, a demon summoned to a high-fantasy world, and interact with others through her. As you travel the world, will your demonic nature take over, or will you learn from others how to be a good person?

name: Lighthaze World
description: Discover a charming adventure in Lighthaze World, a cozy puzzle game for adventure lovers. Collect treasure, solve nonlinear puzzles and follow the anxious hero's heartfelt journey to save their loyal dog. Your decisions shape this delightful puzzle experience.

name: Terra Flame
description: Terra Flame is a horizontal shmup inspired by the 90's. The feature is that you can switch between three types of weapons in real time.

name: Tinyfolks
description: Train your folks, defeat monsters and upgrade your town!

name: C&T
description: C&T is a Goofy Team-Strategy Multiplayer game where you play either as a cop or a thief in teams through a small town. Lets see who can rule between the crime and the law!

name: The Busker
description: A metroidvania 2D platformer where you explore a dystopian urban landscape. Smash your enemies with your trusted guitar! Unlock new abilities and weapons. Meet friends and make choices that will affect the future of this city.

name: Bare Butt Boxing
description: Take control of alien youngsters mesmerized by the sport of boxing as they battle it out all over our beloved planet Earth, unaware of the laws and traditions of human society. Enjoy the chaos and whimsy of simulated characters and environments in this action arena brawler that will keep you hooked with surprising combat twists and gameplay variety. Board the spaceship, we're off to the next scrimmage!

name: Find the Gnome 2
description: Help find these adorable gnome creatures. Is it behind the tree? Is it in the bushes? Look, what shuffles over there? ]Features hand modeled stylized low poly lush 3D environments with as much interaction as possible, supported by atmospheric music. And comics! Its all about the feel.

name: SGS Fall Weiss
description: The very first Blitzkrieg campaign of WW2 is covered by this game on a daily basis. And you can also explore alternative situations of different war starts, with the ‘What-if’ scenarios. Man your tanks!

name: This Next Time
description: This Next Time is a sci-fi strategy game.

name: Crusader: Dungeon Series
description: Crusader: Dungeon Series Dungeon of Dagginor is the first in the series and is a simple dungeon crawler.

name: Other
description: Challenge your friends in Other ! Collect 5 letters to eliminate your opponents, be the last player alive to win !

name: Hall Infinite
description: Hall Infinite is a challenging infinite runner with multiple varied environments and several playable characters! You will require precise timing and deliberate movements in order to achieve a high score.

name: Car Mechanic Manager 2023
description: Car Mechanic Manager is a tycoon management game that lets you manage your own car mechanic business! Build, expand and modernize your car workshop to maintain a good reputation and attract more customers. Manage your business efficiently and destroy the competition!

name: Adorable Witch 3
description: Adorable Witch 3 is a level puzzle game. Players need to control various mechanics in the level to help the witches and elves of the Magic Academy get flowers to pass the trainee witch test.

name: Rabbit's Tale
description: The tale of a Rabbit that goes in search of his family after they were kidnapped by a sovereign entity that has an oppressive dominion over his world. But, along the way, something very mystical and dark happens to our hero.

name: Revenge on the Streets 3
description: In this new and last continuation, the wife of the former crime boss assumes her role as boss and puts an end to the life of the game's protagonist's brother, helps Karina and her family get the last fight in "Revenge On The Streets"

name: Pirate Souls
description: A 2D Online RPG where you can become the most wanted pirate, the strongest bounty hunter or even the highest-ranking Marine! Customize your character to be uniquely yours, level up and find treasures. Start your adventure in the world of Pirate Souls now!

name: OneShotRogue
description: Deck-building roguelike Use cards to reduce the enemy's HP to just 0. This is an easy battle because all battles are over in one turn.

name: Cursed Dungeon Raider
description: An exploration adventure with spooky and horror elements, where you have to recover real historic artifacts from excavation sites all over the world. Watch out for local traps and monsters based on the mythology of the respective region.

name: Return of the Video Dead: Demon in the Shell
description: A Haunted Arcade, collect coins to play games to avoid getting haunted by the Demon that haunts this place. Shadows will scare you, voices will make you jump, avoid the ghost´s that roam this place by hiding. Will you be able to get a highscore?

name: Contexto
description: "Contexto" is a version of the browser game "Semantle", where your objective is to guess a word based a similarity calculated by AI. With each attempt, the game will tell you how close you are to the answer.

name: Darza's Dominion
description: The Dominion takes no prisoners! Fight for your survival in the unforgiving terrains that surround you, strengthen your hero through slaying dangerous creatures, gather a group of allies and bring the battle to Darza in this fast-paced roguelike cooperative bullet-hell MMO!

name: Fishing Vacation
description: A Game Boy styled fishing horror adventure

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child: Log6
description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure

name: Orbit or Beat: Extended Edition
description: Get ready for new type of rhythm action game you may have never experienced before. Listen to various awesome music, control your ball, and dodge all the obstacles to get through all the levels. But be prepared to any unexpected and "unfair" gimmicks designed throughout the levels.

name: Ark Mobius: Censored Edition
description: This is a game containing "beautiful girl + rhythm game + multi ending GALGAME". In 2320, a huge monster appeared on the earth.Only magic energy can do harm to the monster.However,there is no more magic energy left on earth. So,you need to gain the energy from magical girls and save your world.

name: Edge of Reality: Lost Secrets of the Forest - Collector's Edition
description: A growing phenomenon threatens the forest...

name: Soaring
description: Climb upwards and uncover the mystery of your lost egg in this unique platformer. Along the way you will find hidden treasures, brave devious traps and hopefully keep solid footing, its a long way from the top !

name: Jigsaw Novel: Double Trouble
description: Layla Scott can't decide which is her favorite: the dean or the physics teacher so she takes both of them. Solve all 12 jigsaw puzzles to find out how it turned out for Layla.

name: The Price of Flesh
description: An immersive choose-your-own-adventure survival horror with optional adult content featuring hand drawn backgrounds, sprites, and over 150 pieces of full screen art- and 50 endings.

name: Tilt
description: Tilt is an action-racing game with expressive three-button controls and shortcut incentivizing topdown maps. Upgrade your modules and expand your moveset. Escape time-traveling explosions through different solar systems.

name: New Horizon
description: New Horizon is a survival with RPG game. Explore a vast world in search of resources, build, upgrade your equipment and fight monsters to survive.

name: Conquest
description: Go from alone in the forest, to leading your army to victory! Choose your weapons and level up to unlock new skills, kill enemies to earn loot and gold, and construct a village to raise an army. The open world is full of enemies and villages, all of which are ready for combat.

name: Sarrisa and the Legendary Sword
description: Sarissa and the Legendary Sword is a Brazilian turn-based RPG, with a simple and beautiful story. In it, you will follow friends, Sarissa, Dandara, Elaine and Patricia, as they go on an adventurous journey, where love and friendship, and a fated destiny will change their lives forever.

name: Block Kuzushi
description: It is a retro 3D block breakout that you can easily play. All operations are possible with only the mouse, and the ball behaves by physics.

name: Dark Sheep: Master Chapter
description: Want more challenge? Then you'll love Master Chapter for Dark Sheep! The Master chapter combines the unique puzzle elements of the original game and the free content update Aftermath into 30 challenging but fair levels that will test your wits.

name: Happiness Double Room
description: The summer has come to an end. You've been kidnapped by a sister you've known for a long time. Leave all your troubles, stresses and worries behind. Live a happy life with your sister in the next few weeks!

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Iron Nerds
description: Only one chance, only for the bravest. You cannot continue in case of defeat.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack XS
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Lilium
description: Lilium is an action role-playing game taking place in a very small, but dense open world. It has a short, interesting main story, several side quests, dungeons and exciting secrets waiting to be discovered. Find your fun by interacting with your surroundings, develop your character, loot everything.

name: Naughty Waifu
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: SonderDo
description: You have to survive the night until 08:00/8 AM. The only thing you have by your side is your flashlight. This game is a mix of Co-op, multiplayer, and strategy. It is especially hard to maneuver around the school since the teachers can hear you inside of an area.

name: Comixxx Memories
description: Comixxx Memories is a casual game with relaxing atmosphere featuring high quality, hot & sexy girls done in comic book style. Enjoy the classic card match gameplay.

name: Airborne
description: Fly a small aircraft exploring an infinite world!

name: Disc Golf: Game On
description: The fun of disc golf, coming to PC and console. Featuring six different throw types, ten unique courses and tons of new plastic!

name: Blank Space
description: In space, use your high-speed jetpack and unique items to play with your enemies and unleash overwhelming firepower with a variety of customizable weapons. Control the floating debris with physics and defeat your enemies!

name: BroBlast
description: BROBLAST is a top down builder game where you defend your base from enemies

name: The Backrooms Lost Tape
description: You work in the cinema as an usher and accidentally fell into the Backrooms, now being trapped, needing to unravel the mysteries of the yellow rooms in order to get out of this place, but be careful, there are entities that will be in your way.

name: Press A For Achievements
description: Press, mash and hold A to earn achievements, level-up, collect coins and prove your awesomeness on the worldwide leaderboard. Probably the most fun you can have with one hand.

name: Twilight Monk
description: Explore the shattered world of Speria as the last remnant of ancient Kung Fu warriors in Twilight Monk! Destroy demons, or enslave them as you hunt down and obliterate the portals from whence they came. In Twilight Monk, you will explore Metroidvania dungeons connected by an open world.

name: Monster
description: The princess is gorgeous, out of this world. However, reality is often hidden behind what we see. The princess has a slave named MC and she is often seen torturing him. Visiting the royal library recently, MC stumbled upon a magical book. So, how will MC take advantage of the book, let’s find out.

name: Path of Becoming
description: Path of Pecoming is a quest adventure in which you have to travel to the mysterious world of the magical Grimoire!

name: GT Manager
description:
Manage your team from the pit wall to learn and master the art of racing.
Scout sponsors and drivers, invest in your factory to research and build performance parts.

Score championship points and climb rankings to move up Leagues.
No driving skills are required, instruct your drivers from the pit!

Collect official Porsche, Mercedes, McLaren, Nissan, Audi, Corvette and other manufacturer cars, earn championship points to progress through the leagues, improve the performance of your cars, the statistics of your drivers and many more.

Race on 16 different tracks in Sprint, Endurance, Daily and Seasonal races, adapt your strategy to tracks and racing days conditions.

Ready to manage your team? Download GT Manager now!

name: Solos
description:
Solos is a puzzle bullet hell with "paper style" graphics.
Practically you'll have to create your own bullet hell, by avoiding bouncing bullets you'll shoot trying to hit all screen elements.

name: Zombies Around Us
description: Zombies Around Us - tower defense style game. Defend the tower from zombies and earn coins, use coins to upgrade weapons.

name: King Safety
description: Sin descripción

name: Tony Hawk's Project 8 Mobile
description:
If it's speed you're after, it's speed you're going to get. Tony Hawk has gone mobile in a whole new and exciting way, with some mad speed, sweet tricks and fantastically smooth animation. In order to beat the best skaters around, including Tony Hawk himself, all you need to do is hit the correct directions at the correct time.

Hit enough and you'll score big and boost your speed, but fail and your skater will eat gravel. Think you've got what it takes to place 1st and taste the glory?

name: Angevillia
description: Sin descripción

name: Happi Basudei
description: Sin descripción

name: Realm of Mecha
description: Sin descripción

name: Into the Dead 2: Unleashed
description:
Do whatever it takes to save your family and survive the zombie apocalypse in this ultimate action shooter! How far will you go to make it out alive?

Armed with an arsenal of powerful weapons, you must fend off ever-increasing zombie threats while crossing treacherous terrain. In a world where no one is safe, do what needs to be done to stay alive. Maim, mow down, and eliminate the Dead – anything to keep moving.

description:
In the distant past, the black dragon and the white dragon created a vast and mysterious eastern continent after thousands of years of struggle.
Nine relics with powerful power appear on the continent, and it is said that the power is enough to rule the world.
Behind the battle for relics, the black dragon plots a plot. Will Orient Arcadia fall into darkness again?
Only you can save the world now.

name: Jigsaw Fun 3-in-1 Collection
description: Solve 300 jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature, Amazing Animals and Greatest Cities. Choose puzzles from 30 to 600 pieces and play solo or together up to 4 players!

name: Galagi Shooter
description: Galagi Shooter is based on the old school arcade hit space defender game, probably one of the best game ever made. Highly playable, action-packed, this game include many aliens waves to defeat and power ups to collect.

name: Rogue Planet
description: Plunge into this unique turn-based strategy game set in a futurist world. Take command of unbelievable battles in Solo and Multiplayer modes! Discover the story through numerous cutscenes. Complete 19 campaign missions to defeat the machines and take back Earth!

name: Battles of the Ancient World III
description: The 'Battles of the Ancient World' game system is a tactical simulation of some of the greatest and most important battles from 1457 B.C. to 378 A.D.. Each, of the 5 scenarios available, features one of these great battles and players may play as either side. Each unit in the game represents an actual unit that participated in the battle, each with an actual strength between 250 and 1,200 men. The map represents the actual terrain over which each battle was fought. The game in the series has been designed to ensure maximum playability and historical accuracy, in that order. There are 60 different units across all the missions, ranging from elite Roman Legionaries, to Egyptian Chariots. Each unit has its own unique ability that you need to take advantage of in order to win each battle.

name: Driftkhana
description: Built with freedom in mind, there are no point systems, time limits, or rules simply because when it comes to cars and drifting, you should be free to do whatever you want! Driftkhana lets you drift till your heart's content, interacting with a variety of objects within the set. Moveable ramps, giant road cones and beach balls are but a few of the fun props you'll find yourself skidding around.

name: Partia 3
description:
Partia 3 is a SRPG (Strategy Role-playing) video game inspired by Fire Emblem and Tear Ring Saga series. In a high fantasy setting, the game will take players through an adventure where magic and sword collide and friendship and betrayal intertwine.
Partia 3: The Knight of Partia is the third installment of the Partia series that wraps up the 'Granian Trilogy'. However, the game is designed as a stand-alone set in hundreds of years after the events of Partia 2, hence no knowledge of the prior games is required. The game includes 30 stages (including 5 hidden stages) that should provide solid 30 plus hours of game play if not 50 or 100.

name: Super Wizard Fever
description:
Feel the rush of being a real wizard running in a full blown fever pitch! Super Wizard Fever is an arcade-style endless runner with a unique retro twist. Perfect your jumping and boosting skills as you try to achieve the biggest high score ever!
The energetic, retro soundtrack and old-school visuals will make you feel the way you did when you were just a young 112 year old apprentice wizard. Dust off your running robes and jumping spells because you're about to experience what it is to have a Super Wizard Fever!

name: Final Guardian 2
description: Take the role of Abigail the Final Guardian of the secret realm in this unique and challenging autorunner. Your mission as the Final Guardian is to find and return the treasures back to there rightful place. Restoring balance to this magical land.

name: Anno 1800: Seeds of Change
description:
The 1st DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 4 Pass.

Be part of the new world’s agricultural boom with the modular haciendas and face the challenges of a new scenario.

name: Anno 1800: Empire of the Skies
description:
Using the latest construction materials from the New World, you can build a variety of new specialized airships.

Optimize your logistical network by transferring goods and workers between your islands in the New World, and keep your people connected with the new mail system.

Your tactical planning will also take on a whole new dimension as you and your competitors vie for aerial mastery.

name: Anno 1800: New World Rising
description:
The 3rd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 4 Pass.
Experience the cultural boom in the New World, celebrate with a new population tier and discover new islands to expand!

Anno 1800 DLC 12 includes the following content:

Discover a brand-new, high class society residence tier for the New World – the Artistas.
Take advantage of newly spotted islands on the New World map and use the additional space to expand your empire further.
Embrace the culture of your New Worlds residents by building the Stadium, the grand new monument.
Be able to experience Anno without tax income and beat the ever-changing market to reclaim lost artifacts in the fourth Scenario of Anno 1800.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2: Complete Edition

name: Tap! Dig! My Museum!
description:
Create an exhibition stand to display your fossils.
Gradually restore and develop the run down museum.

Survivors' desperate survival game begins now!

name: Gabriel's Auditory Playground
description: Gabriel's Auditory Playground has no graphics, no visuals, no way to experience the gameplay with your eyes. In Gabriel's Auditory Playground, your eyes have no use. Put your ears to the test and play through mini-games designed without sight in mind!

name: Neophyte
description: A mini action rogue-lite with chaotic spell-slinging hack-n-slash combat. Collect spells and perks to become an unstoppable wizard and destroy hordes of monsters.

name: Nirmita
description: Nirmita is a fabulous world full of mysteries, laughter and sudden discoveries! The tough task of survival here will be brightened up by hilarious creatures, adorable NPCs, many builds, crafting and home improvements, as well as an intriguing story of finding the main villain with several endings!

name: Gods' Margarita
description: Βecome the latest hope of humanity! Embody the psyche of Reniat Noc and explore the post-apocalyptic lands of AI Legave. Customize your character with futuristic gadgets, solve real-life puzzles, discover the history that led to your present, and bring life into the future.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Golf
description: Sonic the Hedgehog Golf is a 2D golf game featuring Sonic, Tails and Knuckles trying to get golf balls to end-of-level signposts in various zones from Sonic the Hedgehog. Points are awarded for staying under par, as well as collecting rings and monitors.

name: Esport Club Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventurers.io

name: Dark Days: Zombie Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Stay Alive
description:
Kill zombies to survive. Join thousands of players in one of the epic zombie apocalypse games. Fight for survival and stay alive!
The survival action is set in a post apocalypse, when the world saw an outbreak of an unknown infection that destroyed almost all the human race. All those dead started turning into zombies and those few survivors that have resistance in their blood are trying to survive.

name: Project Arena
description: Sin descripción

name: Ragnarok: Labyrinth

name: Stand My Heroes
description:
Stand My Heroes is a mobile game developed by Coly and released on iOS and Android on September 5, 2016. The game is a puzzle combined with otome game style.

An anime television series adaptation aired from October 2019 to December 2019. An original video animation was released in May 2023.

name: KeepUp Pirates
description: You are a pirate on an island, survive alone or with other players and fight against enemy skeletons. Build a shelter and go collect resources to ensure your survival.

name: Visionarium 2: The Descent
description: Visionarium 2 is a psychedelic audio-visualizer. Enter this artistic VR experience that takes you on an immersive journey through the underworld. Come out on the other side transformed, in awe.

name: Landnav
description: Landnav is the ultimate adventure race. Plan. Prepare. Survive. Excel. Use real world navigation techniques to blaze your path across awe inspiring vistas. Become an unstoppable adventure athlete.

name: Rally
description: Gather together troops and weapons to fight through increasingly difficult armies in this rogue-like deck-building game. Establish synergies between your cards and treasures to create the strongest army!

name: On a Roll 3D: Levels 7 - 9
description: Three brand new worlds of On A Roll 3D with new music and graphics. Each world has three areas and a boss. Lots of new puzzles and game mechanics with new fastest time leaderboards for each area.

name: Big Screen Games: Pack 1
description: Time to bring the party into your living room. Introducing Big Screen Games, a party game experience where players use their phones as controllers - and play together on the big screen. Prepare for disastrous doodles, awkward face-offs and a pink cow that wants to ruin your day.

name: Redactle
description: Redactle is a daily browser-based puzzle game where the user tries to determine the subject of a random obfuscated Wikipedia article, chosen from Wikipedia's 10,000 Vital Articles. Type in words to reveal them on the page. Figure out the article title to win. New puzzle daily at 11:00 am CDT (16:00 UTC).

name: The Lost Weld
description: The Lost Weld is an exciting, fantasy-themed action-adventure game being made by an all-female development team. The game features a compelling, movie-like script recorded by some of the industry’s top voice-acting talents, beautiful open world environments, and engaging game action.

name: Trick or Treat
description: Trick or Treat - is an effective and hardcore 2D platformer with surviving elements where you will have to do various levels playing like a Jack-o-lantern.

name: Quester
description: Quester is an action roguelike inspired by classic arcade games of yore. Assume control of a courageous adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes, all while keeping your stamina-- AKA "POWER" bar charged.

name: Sumy Shelltris: Iceblocks 1
description: Tetris? Not! Mutant Tetris!

name: Match 3 Fantasy
description: A love-letter to classic turn-based RPGs with match 3 puzzle combat and point-&-click gameplay. Travel the globe, battle enemies, and save the world!

name: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic
description: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic is a Survival Horror game where you, as the protagonist, must escape from a mad clown who appears in random stages of his anger. The killer clown is a psychopath. He is a unique type of enemy. He likes to play with the protagonist before dealing with her.

name: Words
description: A slow-paced, story-driven, first-person game that offers an abstract and surrealistic exploration of a troubled mind in its journey towards acceptance.

name: Autos
description: Autos is driving game contains five modes Racing, Car Park Drift, Truck Challenge, Rally and Transportation Open World Driving.

name: Zombies and Keys
description: Zombies and Keys is a short action-adventure game with simple, satisfying combat and pure exploration, carefully designed to minimize cognitive load. Perfect for someone who values gameplay over everything else.

name: 7Swordsman
description: A medieval turn-based RPG

name: Shatterspace
description: Super-tight controls and satisfying mechanics will guide you from the seemingly-peaceful early levels all the way to complete insanity in this survival space adventure. Beginner pilots will grow, skilled pilots will be challenged, but only the best will reach the end.

name: Marshmallow
description: Marshmallow is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame created by Hokotate Makoto in RPG Maker XP.

name: Brainsss
description: Control multiple groups of zombies and guide them to victory with touch controls. Trap, chase, intimidate, and ultimately, convert those annoying humans. Build a massive swarm of zombies and trash the human defenses. Careful some of the humans will fight back! Unlock unique Hero zombies to power-up your zombie swarm with bonuses and special abilities. Play through more than 70 amazing, beautiful levels that include suburbia, hospitals, parks, airports, cities, and offices, to name a few. Use your cunning, strategy, and on the fly decision making to catch them all!

name: Incremental Epic Hero 2
description: A mixture of incremental/idle and roleplaying game set in fantasy world filled with monsters and things to explore, where battling is constant, almost everything can be upgraded, and with wide array of various prestige mechanics to always keep things interesting and moving forward!

name: 13: Origin - Chapter One
description: Unknowingly revealing a great secret about human history, will Edmond be able to live with this secret? 13:ORIGIN is a story-based adventure and puzzle game full of suspense and excitement, where you can progress by solving puzzles. Here is the first chapter of the journey.

name: My Naughty Shotgun
description: Shoot bloody demons and giant penises with your extremely Naughty naked shotgun in this fast paced doom-like FPS!

name: I Got a Millenary Cat
description: The injured kitten was brought home... One day she takes on a human form! "I got a millenary cat” is a placement game in which you can observe the life of a cat girl.

name: Agony VR
description: Agony VR is a first-person survival horror game. You will take on a role of trapped soul placed in the middle of hellish chaos without any memories about your past. During your journey, you will get to know, that the only way out of this place requires a meeting with the Red Goddess.

name: Equinox
description: The moon has shattered. Plunged into darkness, the world looks to an unlikely hero: a tiny yet tenacious bunny. Defy all odds and reach for the stars in this whimsical 2D platformer.

name: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition
description: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition puts you in the middle of the action - use a variety of weapons to battle the terrifying Sharknado. Maim, shoot and explode your way through hordes of hungry flying sharks and other airborne sea creatures in Sharknado VR!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines
description: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines brings a new and exciting addition to the game we know and love. Have you already disassembled all the ships on the sandy beach? Then now it’s time to put your skills to test with submarines!

name: Tyrant Quest: Gold Edition
description: Tyrant Quest is an erotic, dark fantasy visual novel about a Dark Lord who seeks revenge after being sealed away for a hundred years. And so he sets out with his last loyal subject, the succubus Lili, seeking a way to regain his power!

name: Dickdown Duel
description: Dickdown Duel is an erotic card game RPG about a card game that got lewd cards modded into it. Acquire new cards, build decks, challenge cute girls and dominate them in Lewd card based duels.

name: Shibainu: VR Katana Simulator
description: ShibaInu is a virtual reality (VR) Katana simulator. This game mainly focuses on proper Katana handling, physics interactions and cutting mechanics. Precise and controlled cuts are performed on Tatamis (traditional Japanese floor mat) rolled into a cylindrical shape.

name: ReEstate
description: A real estate investment and business simulator, with aspects of life simulator who puts you in the skin of someone who just lost everything including your parents and needs to win in life.

name: Lord of the Click 3
description: The Orcs are getting closer and very soon they will get so close that it will be impossible to get out of the elf kingdom. For the good of the people, the king himself is ready to stop the army of monsters. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

name: Our Fate Forsaken
description: Zeph passed away and became an angel. He first meets Archangel Gabriel, who is very possessive of him. And on Earth, he meets Asa, with who he feels a connection. Gabriel used to be his guardian angel, and Asa is still his soulmate. It's no wonder the two are fond of him. Maybe too fond of him..

name: Nebula
description: A single-player starship colony simulation game with RPG elements, set in a vast galaxy waiting to be explored!

name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Mountaineer's Legacy
description: It's summer in the French highlands for Mia Faircroft! Discover a picturesque mountainside town in this Hidden Object game. Explore breathtaking locations, restore priceless treasures, and help out the various residents of Mont Cache!

name: Gate Builders
description: Gate Builders is a sci-fi turn-based 4X strategy game. Build space stations, manage work force, exploit, trade and transform resources. Face space pirates and enemy factions. Build, Expand, Thrive!

name: SGS Pacific D-Day
description: One game, five great battles where the US Marines gained even more glory, at the price of terrible losses. Relive bloody assaults on Saipan, Tinian, Tarawa, Iwo Jima and Peleliu in this recreation of epic land battles of the Pacific War. Both sides are playable, each with their own challenge

name: DragonScales 7: A Heart of Dark Flames
description: The ultimate DragonScales experience. Tile-matching puzzles, battles and a journey of revenge and redemption.

name: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator
description: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Maze Workout: Western Lost Solo Car Racer
description: It's a retro western styled, maze racing game with 50 levels and 30 western style musics, find the checkpoints and laps to the next level.

name: NSFW Studio
description: NSFW Studio is a casual arcade idle clicker game where your job is not only about editing porn videos, but also fucking your freelancers at your work desk. Your side chicks might not like what you do, so keep an eye out and don’t get caught!

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
description: This is about a talented girl "Lasling" with excellent working ability, became a ghost after an accidental death, and meets the only person in the world who can see and touch her --"Mofft", a story of love and parting.

name: Paige Turner
description: In this adventure, you'll travel through a magical library and platform your way through a library lost to time in order to reconnect a father and daughter after tragedy tore them apart. Utilize unique abilities to overcome the library's troublesome obstacles and unlock the pieces of the story!

name: Topspin
description: Jump and dash your way to victory in this vibrant side-scrolling platformer. Navigate through stunning environments and intricate puzzles on your quest to punch powerful enemies and save your kingdom.

name: Everburning
description: A dormant secret lay beneath the ruins of a forgotten world. A Goddess, unravelling from the rumbles of a temple, entrusts you with a mission: to build a female-only guild. Can you, noble warrior, fulfil her request?

name: Funerary Services Marquez Paz
description: Enter the rough streets of Marquez Paz, Argentina. Explore the neighborhood and meet its peculiar inhabitants, work for "the fune" and get some cash, cave the head in of a couple of idiots and get some more cash. Get used to it, because the things you're going to see... Oh... Good heavens!...

name: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

name: Minotaur Princess
description: Rescue the Princess? You are the princess! Defeat the minotaur? You ARE the minotaur! Embark on the journey of a princess who gets body swapped with a minotaur. A puzzle fighter RPG where your wits and cunning will be put to the test in a combination of turn based and real-time gameplay.

name: Lifecraft
description: Survive and evolve as an organism with this simulation game in which you will literally start as a single cell and manage and organize all its functions to a fully fledged system! Assemble, breathe, eat, fight threats, produce energy, grow, anything is possible!

name: The Forked Road
description: The Forked Road is a story about traveling through a dead world in search of a place to call home. Which path will you choose, and can you not lose yourself?

name: Steel Deal
description: Play as an unnamed guy and solve the mystery of an old mansion while being haunted by a welder. Discover an epic journey through many exciting and hard levels!

name: Enjoy
description: A very different kind of destruction game where you can build, knock, break, crush and destroy anything you want

name: Bones and Magic
description: Bones and Magic is a tower defense game in which the player uses towers and traps to stop enemies. Use your magic wand and build various traps and towers to eliminate all enemies. Collect crystals from enemies and buy upgrades for your traps.

name: Pokémon Divine Sword
description: Pokémon Divine Sword is a difficulty rom hack of Pokémon Sword, making edits to nearly every Pokémon, as well as making all of the ones included in the base games' DLC available. Furthermore, the teams of all trainers have been redone in order to enhance the difficulty and deepen gameplay.

name: Dark Hood
description: 2D Platformer. Combination of cyberpunk and magic.

name: Land Above Sea Below
description: Land Above Sea Below is an atmospheric building strategy and puzzle game where you have to build your island from tiles in order to raise its height as much as possible, to avoid it getting flooded by the constantly rising sea level.

name: Rover Operator
description: Various space rovers operate on hostile distant planets. They surmount all sorts of difficult obstacles, sheer walls, lava, gravity traps, lasers etc. to explore alien worlds, to gather resources and help humans in places where they couldn’t survive. It’s a game of skill, wariness and dexterity.

name: Eftu
description: In a world threatened by a mysterious interdimensional entity, pick your guild, pick your ship, and pick your battles! Compete with other guilds for resources in a variety of game modes, including Team Versus, Battle Royale, and Racing!

name: GG-Party
description: GG-Party is a party-game for up to 8 player. Grab your friends, choose your favourite colour, and get ready to defend it with all your power!

name: Mini Island: Cosmos
description: Mini Island: Cosmos is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Gloomgrave
description: Gloomgrave is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a retro pixel aesthetic. Upgrade your Gloomcrawler with unique perks and experiment with different builds as you try to survive each depth in search of the ultimate ancient relic.

name: Raise Your Tribe
description: RAISE YOU TRIBE and fight against Robots or other Survivors. Explore, Craft, Build and Survive in a deadly post-nuclear war island where artificial intelligence has defeated humanity. Start from scratch and end up as the leader of Island!

name: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness
description: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness is a platform game with puzzles where you control Astro, an Astronaut who is on a lunar base whose mission is to research teleportation. After a big accident millions of portals start to appear. Now he has to find a way to escape.

name: Looping Bravery
description: Looping Bravery is a sci-fi deckbuilding roguelike card battler. Try to find a way to save the planet from an impending alien invasion by traveling back in time to stop an event knows as "The Marking" from happening. Fight in the past to save the future.

name: Mana Launcher
description: Embark on an epic MMO multiverse adventure in a totally free RPG game, and become a legend which will be remembered across generations, universes, be memorable in whole worlds. Feel the mana power growing on you!

name: Boooost!!!!
description: Boooost!!!! is a skill-based, sci-fi themed action platformer with some narrative driven elements and some minor puzzle elements.

name: SpellTome
description: SpellTome is a story driven fantasy adventure 2D platformer. Hurl balls of magic, dash across levels, and jump over obstacles while trying to get the fabled SpellTome.

name: Duks
description: Duks is a simple survivor type of minesweeper game

name: Remains of Morrow
description: An atmospheric third person game about a wizard's final quest. The game tells the story of the victories and failures of a wizard who was once considered the best. Now in the twilight years of his life he’s asked by a stranger for a favor. Take control of the wizard and complete his final mission.

name: Soccer League
description:
Soccer League is a mobile game wich cames with Nokia devices, making it first appereance on the Nokia 1200 on 2007.
The game features a Cup with 3 levels of difficulty.

name: SongTrivia 2: Guess the song
description: Create multiplayer games & play with your friends on The music trivia game !

name: Heads Will Roll: Downfall
description: Heads Will Roll: Downfall is a combination of a tactical role-playing game and visual novel, in which you will assume the role of a medieval soldier.

name: Nightfall Comes
description: Nightfall Comes is a 3D top-view action game with rogue-lite, story of the four protagonists who gathered to the castle of certain land, led by their last lingering feelings in the extinct world.

name: Dashing Orange
description: A 2D precision platformer about a little Orange that can dash and jump around this abstract world to avoid all the traps in the way to reach you goal.

name: Crawling Silence
description: Uncover the mysteries of an old, long forgotten building with a dark past, or choose to try and escape the creatures lurking within it with friends! Crawling Silence features two main modes, a story mode and an online co-op mode.

name: Dissonance
description: Dissonance is a top-down 3rd person adventure game. Players will encounter supernatural anomalies and creatures. Find and use specialized gadgets to aid you in your journey. Explore the abandoned research facility and reveal the secret of the organization that sent you here.

name: The Hand of Glory: The Blowtorch Files
description: A young girl, Erica Thimber, vanishes into thin air overnight. Is it a classic teen runaway? That's not what Lazarus Bundy, renowned serial killer hunter in charge of the case, believes.

name: Baller Blast
description: A new twist on the classic brick-breaker!

name: Penguin Slide
description: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

name: Pogan
description: Embark on a journey to bring peace to Wyraj in this Slavic mythology-inspired adventure. Explore endless, generated lands as you strive for victory over powerful gods and demons. Alone or with friends, embrace the unknown yet to come.

name: Cat Nips
description: Cat Nips is a game about a cat eating people to escape an office. This cat will need to sneak past guards, cameras and other dangers in order to escape.

name: Dreg Cannon
description: Rise up and help save New Vega from the Techno-mages!

name: Hinter
description: Hinter is a horror game based on a brutal piece of disturbing crime case in Bavaria Germany

name: Stardust Exile
description: Stardust Exile is an RTS set in the Milky Way galaxy, containing currently known stars and exoplanets with their real characteristics. The remaining star systems are procedurally generated. It has both online mode and single-player skirmish mode. The online server is persistent and single-shard.

name: Groove Fit Island!!
description: Rhythm x Fitness x VR! Let's get fit while having fun to the music with the unique animals!

name: SeaDogs of Nassau
description: Nassau lies in ruins. Its people look to you to restore it to its former glory. Will you loot, plunder, and decimate all who stand in your way as a pirate? Or will you use your strength and charisma to rise through the ranks of the Navy? Choose your path in this dynamic sandbox adventure.

name: Hostlight
description: Hostlight is a first-person puzzle game with mechanics that revolve around the use of light and shadow, and the creation of objects that help to solve the puzzles throughout the game.

name: Emiko's Pledge 2
description: Emiko's Pledge 2 is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a Half-Demon girl called Emiko, whose mission is to protect all the residents of the Ettaze state from the enemies who infiltrated into the territory.

name: The Golden Rose: Book One
description: Explore an alternative medieval Europe in this low-fantasy epic adventure! How far are you willing to go to take back your stolen treasure?

name: Jack & Detective
description: Find Jack out among us.Players are divided into "Jack the Ripper" and "Detective" and try to guess who is Jack.You cannot talk to other players in this game, so you must deduce who is Jack by relying solely on the actions of each player. Each game takes 10 minutes.

name: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent
description: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent is a break-neck, violent boomer shooter inspired by classics of the genre. Experience the story behind the events of Cathedral 3-D and make your enemies regret ever crossing your path. Become a beast and let loose.

name: Tennis Manager 2022
description: Become a tennis manager. Manage your tennis academy and train the next tennis super stars. Even more realistic, with new players and updated potentials. Take the reins in 2022.

name: Home Survival
description: Home Survival is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first and third person shooter, survival, crafting, and role-playing games. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down.

name: Prince of Suburbia
description: Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic adult visual novel with only one thing on its mind. This simple sandbox game is packed with lewd scenes and sprinkled with a fun story that aims to never leave you wanting more.

name: Eternal Return: Character Pack
description: Unlock 8 of characters to add diversity to your strategies of survival.

name: Death Duel VR
description: Death Duel VR is a physics-based PVP only game in medieval background. Meet with other players online by hosting or joining a match. Level up your warrior to gain access to more weapons and armors, and unlock more maps and play mode.

name: Madville+
description: Madville+ is an arena shooter with rogue-lite elements, where you fight incoming waves of aliens and customize your guns as you progress. It is designed to have short play sessions (30-40 min) and replayability.

name: Raid Off!
description: Boss rush with your raiders in this MMO simulator. Adapt your stategy in this Real Time Strategy with pauses. If bosses are hard, wait to see when you will share a legendary loot among your raiders.

name: Nightmare Party
description: Nightmare Party is a 5 player co-op multiplayer horror FPS. You are trapped demon hunters and your goal is to survive and escape while a demon and its minions try to kill you.

name: Kargo
description: Collect containers with your spaceship to activate color-coded gates, navigate through challenging levels as fast as possible and deliver your cargo in this 2D cave-flyer with a focus on puzzle elements.

name: Bloody Forest
description: Bloody Forest is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-5 players. You got lost in the forest and you are looking for potential inhabitants or something to repair your car. But what you don't know is that a monster lives here.

name: Spirit Hunters: Infinite Horde
description: You are the Spirit Hunters in this action rogue-lite. Slay huge waves of monsters and harvest their souls for ever increasing power. Unlock many playable characters, abilities, maps and more through a deep progression system.

name: Studio Apart(ment)
description: You just moved to a new city. The rooms are small, the people aren't very nice, and there's nothing to do. Is there? Play through 7 days of a life sim and then do it again. After each run, buy upgrades and unlock new areas. Explore a new procedurally generated city every reset.

name: Cartomancy Anthology
description: The Cartomancy Anthology is a virtual tarot deck of 22 games from 22 teams that replicate the actions and experiences of tarot readings by shuffling and drawing cards. Pull a single game, or a spread of three, for a digital reading. Launch and complete each game to collect all the cards and complete your virtual tarot deck!

name: Just Upstream
description: Help Paul on his journey to find self worth as he jumps, climbs, and swings through mystic nature in this Physics-based VR platformer.

name: Six Aspects
description: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy.

name: Empty War
description: "You're the best warrior in your planet. Now your race want to conquert everything, and you're the only one to stop them."

name: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara
description: Join Koa and her best friend Napopo on an action-packed adventure through the islands of Mara! Outwit traps, manoeuvre dangerous environments, and explore a series of dazzlingly different landscapes on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.

name: Jewel Match Origins 2: Bavarian Palace - Collector's Edition
description: Travel back in time to the Romantic Era and build a magnificent castle in this royal match-3 adventure! Explore 180 huge levels and collect resources to construct a majestic palace for the Bavarian King. Enjoy 3 different modes: timed, relaxed, and moves limited!

name: Back 4 Blood: Tunnels of Terror
description: Tunnels of Terror features the all-new PvE areas “Ridden Hives”, along with 2 new playable Cleaners, new Legendary Weapons, 12 weapon skins, new cards, 8 premium skins, and the fearsome Warped Ridden to discover below the depths of Evansburgh.

name: Eldertrail
description: Eldertrail is a turn-based strategy with rpg elements and adventure cards based exploration. You will take control of unique heroes, explore the world, build up your town, fight tactical battles, craft legendary weapons, level up and evolve your units and heroes to take out your opponents.

name: Expeditions: Rome - Death or Glory
description: Don the armour of a Gladiator and enter the arena to win fame and fortune in ‘Death or Glory!’ Play with the new Gladiator character class as you tackle 3 new arenas either during the campaign or in the brand-new Gladiator mode.

name: Magic Tower: Destroy the Wormhole
description: Magic Tower: Destroy the Wormhole is a fixed value strategy game. Similar to the gameplay of the classic magic tower, on this basis, new gameplay, rich skills and prop types are added. Players can choose different routes to train the role.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Top Class DD
description: This DLC includes the Top Class DD. A luxury double-decker bus for Fernbus Coach Simulator

name: Battle Shooter
description: This is a First-person shooter game. Unique Modified weapons system to create the player's unique gun, conquer every enemy. The combination of the next generation of gameplay, diversified map and mode selection, leading players to the volatile battlefield, enjoy different game fun.

name: DzombZ
description: Survive or die ! Experience survival horror full of puzzles while escaping between the streets of Algeria after zombies invasion . Suffer to protect your life in situations never attempt them before with first person perspective and powerful actions that make it more realistic then ever

name: Shuriken
description: This is a computer RPG game. In the game, players are responsible for playing roles, moving and surviving in a world full of monsters.

name: Engine Evolution 2022
description: PvP racing action is back - with more and better content, and with formulas! Enjoy multiplayer racing action more intense than ever before!

name: Tameshi
description: Tameshi is a retro-themed vertical scrolling shoot 'em up for 1 or 2 players (local co-op). Battle through 7 stages of relentless waves of enemies all bent on your destruction. Destroy them first before taking on the end of stage boss.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite
description: Build jigsaw puzzles - solo and with friends! Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content.

name: Wingspan: European Expansion
description: The Golden Geek Awards-winning expansion to Wingspan, a beautiful, relaxing board game for 1-5 players. Enjoy original gameplay features and attract new extraordinary birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

name: Virtual Circuit Board
description: Virtual Circuit Board is the minimalist drawing-based logic simulator where you will design, program, decorate, and simulate anything from simple monochrome circuits to complex and colorful computers. Explore your creativity in this sandbox experience.

name: Zombie Death Quota
description: Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade, shotgun, snipe and flame your way through the zombie horde and then evacuate in the helicopter.

name: Escape Room Academy
description: It takes the joy of Escape Rooms in a casual and joyful experience. Resolving riddles, getting clues and cracked puzzles have never been so fun and cheerful. Each room has its own quest, and to solve it you are provided with two decks of cards(Clues and Locks) and a room view to inspect.

name: Motorcycle Travel Simulator
description: This is a casual motorcycle driving game, but also a purely realistic travel game. You can ride a motorcycle to travel in the vast open world and enjoy the magnificent scenery!

name: Inferno Arena
description: Prepare for intense 5v5 FPS action. Inferno Arena is a 3-freedoms-of-movement multiplayer First Person Arena Shooter in ultra-low-latency 1,000 ticks-per-second glory.

name: Deadly Rain
description: Deadly Rain is a survival horror FPS game that puts you in a terrifying fight for survival against hordes of scary mutants in a rainy, abandoned village. Find and manage resources to stay alive in the worst and most unexpected situations.

name: Neon Ronin
description: Neon Ronin is a rogue-lite tactical RPG set in a stylish cyberpunk world. Combine unique attacks and abilities with powerful augments to conquer ever-changing encounters. Customize your party's stats and talents as they level up to craft a strategy and squad strong enough to survive the neon city.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 9 - Midnight
description: Play as Midnight in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Midnight's costume.

name: Harddrive
description: Harddrive is a run 'n' gun shooter set in a strange universe. You will fight armies of books and pencils that threaten your home electronic world.

name: Panic Porcupine
description: Dr. Proventriculus is snatching up the Chickabirbs! Help Panic blast through over 50 stages of topsy-turvy, spike-laced, slime-drenched, buzzsaw-filled deathtraps to rescue them! And remember, there are no rings...

name: TactiCats
description: Knock down your enemies and collect all the cats and achievements in this pixel art party game for true cat lovers. Use different power-ups and survive the dangerous traps to show your friends who's the fluffiest of them all!

name: Gales of Nayeli
description: Face an impending darkness threatening the world of Iuven alongside Nayeli and an interesting cast of warriors. Control varied battlefields in Grid-Based Strategy RPG format while interweaving character relationships to the main conflict.

name: Peep Invasion
description: Forge your team from a variety of different creatures, each with their own strengths and abilities, and stop the never-ending invasion of Peeps!

name: In Sink
description: Work together to solve the various puzzles and escape rooms and break free in this stylized multiplayer co-op adventure. Victory requires more than just you and your partner thinking alike - you'll have to be In Sink.

name: Tremblay Island
description: The French-venture has returned... now on Steam!

name: SweetHex: Celestial Encounters
description: Styled after classic point-and-click adventure games of yore, SweetHex aims to deliver a charming and wholesome adventure which features a unique 2.5D style comic panel style storytelling along with a familiar Visual Novel style narrative.

name: Kapellmeister
description: Run. Hide. Follow the orders. Keep quiet. Solve puzzles. Don't forget to check the cameras; someone is stalking you. And if you are lucky, maybe you'll get out of this loop of never-ending and repeating events.

name: Maroon Berets: 2030
description: Maroon Berets: 2030 is FPS, TPS, Action-RPG; which simulates the units of special forces in the war.

name: Voodoo Detective
description: Do you like adventure, comedy, and dime store detective novels? Then boy have we got the game for you! Join Voodoo Detective in a story-rich, hand-drawn noir where you’ll pit your wits and hoodoo know-how against a sinister evil that’s taken root on beautiful Zo Wanga Isle.

name: Ethereal Rift
description: Ethereal Rift is a procedurally generated ARPG based around crafting builds, gathering items and hack and slash combat. Play with up to 4 players in this dark fantasy adventure, slaying huge creatures and dark spirits to bring peace to the middle worlds.

name: The Ancient Cat Temple
description: This is a little Metroidvania where you control a cute archeologist cat trying to find the secrets of an ancient civilization. Explore, solve puzzles and be careful, the brightest path is not always the safest.

name: Overdose WW2
description: Overdose WW2 is an FPS game set in the Second World War. It is a game that aims to offer an experience like 90s FPS games. Overdose comes with content that aims to offer you a long gameplay and nostalgia. The game is an FPS game set in the second world war.

name: Terminal Insanity: RackJacker
description: There’s an imminent threat of nuclear annihilation from the two of the world’s greatest powers, and the protagonist, a female Japanese hacker, has to prevent it from happening while seeking justice for the death of her family.

name: The Breadmaker
description: Welcome to the kitchen of the future! Learning to cook has never been simpler! Enjoy five days of easy to understand recipes guided by our brand new automated instructor. As she helps you with each day's lessons you'll discover that cooking isn't really as scary as you thought.

name: Backrooms: Levels of Fear
description: If you're not careful and no-clip out of reality in wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, and endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz...

name: Murder on Space Station 52
description: Trapped on a space station with a ruthless killer, Edward Locke must solve this mystery, or it will be his last. In this strange place, filled with even stranger people, Edward will discover more about himself than he ever could have imagined.

name: Pizza Synthwave
description: A fast paced parkour game where you have to get to the pizza at the end of each level using your speed, quick reflexes and abilities. Wall run, jump, climb, use your grappling hook to get the fastest time! Set in a gorgeous neon world. For fans of titles such as Mirror's Edge, Hot Lava and Karlson.

name: Hot Tentacles Shooter
description: Hot Tentacles Shooter is a formidable 80's style shooter with a pixel art modern and irresistible.

name: The Fantasy World of Mahjong Princess
description: This is a 2D Japanese Mahjong game with adult simulation features. You are a big Mahjong fan who got reincarnated in another world. As the world‘s top Mahjong tutor, you need to build your own team and train your students while developing special relationships with them.

name: Luminera: The Radiant Journey
