description: Roll the Dice to decide your fate in this Turn Based, Point and Click RPG!

name: The Legend of Gandar
description: The Legend of Gandar is an action-adventure video game. The player slips into the legend of Gandar, in the role of the farm boy. He woke up one day and received a strange letter, and so begins the story of a boy.

name: Increment
description: Press buttons, pull levers, and use your body to discover a strange world in this VR game about increasing. There’s nothing “idle” about this game. Immerse yourself in weird, colorful, reactive environments in this experimental, thought-provoking, hour-long incremental adventure.

name: Deicider
description: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.

name: Astro Traveler
description: A retro style space sim where you mine, trade, bounty hunt, pillage, and explore. In this game you choose you own path as you navigate the galaxy while balancing faction alligence and legality of your actions.

name: Innocence Island
description: Legend has it that the three rays of light in the sky are emitted by a prism that grants happiness to the one who obtains it. You never believed in that, but it is your last resort...

name: World War ToonZ
description: Navigate across the city while surviving wave after wave of spectacular zombie attacks in this dramatic, high-action zombie apocalypse. As you progress deeper into the apocalypse, join your fellow troops in multiplayer to discover who will reign supreme as the final survivor.

name: La Pucelle: Ragnarok
description: For the first time in the West you can experience La Pucelle: Ragnarok, now loaded with lots of extra content including new scenarios, new recruits, and DLC characters! It even has new voices, new music, and quick travel, dood!

name: Runr End
description: Runr End is a challenging FPP-Platformer set in a dreamish world with secrets to discover. Be careful, don't be another fallen soul.

name: XueFeng Mountain: Secret Opera
description: In the Spring Festival of 2005, the blizzard in Xuefeng mountain trapped the drama troupe performing in the village. At the same time, there was a homicide during the performance. Unlike the nervous members of the drama troupe, the villagers were afraid of a more terrible existence than the homicide

name: The Highlands
description: A top down-multiplayer-arena-brawler where you collect resources and craft your weapons of choice all while trying to stay alive and become the ultimate brawler in this fast paced game.

name: Runes Magica
description: Runes Magica is 2D rogue-like magic action game. Use a variety of magic and artifacts to defeat your enemies and end your revenge.

name: Adaca
description: Adaca is a Sci-fi First-person shooter set on the mysterious titular planet. Use your gravity-manipulating robotic arm to hurl heavy objects at your foes or even rip their weapons directly from their hands! Explore and manipulate the environment to stay alive and navigate this eerie, hostile world!

name: Hatsumira: From the Future Undying
description: From the development team behind the Grisaia series, Hatsumira -From the Future Undying- is a fantasy visual novel that transports you into a whole new world filled with swords and sorcery!

name: Furry Tower Defense
description: In a deadly world full of Horde monsters, you and a brigade of weaponized furries must find your way to the land of the Hull through Tower Defense style gameplay, doing everything you can to stop the Horde from destroying your Crystal- then you.

name: Kamiwaza: Way of the Thief
description: Join honorable thief Ebizo on the streets of Mikado, and put your thieving skills to the test! Will you walk the path of honor for the sake of family? The choice is yours to make.

name: Wish World
description: Leap into the world of Wish, a unique plane of existence filled with adventure and action! Around the world of Wish, the world is unfinished and must be restored, Jump into the past and future using dimensional doors! Do you have what it takes to save the world!

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 5
description: This is the fifth chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team", their first completely new game in ten years!

name: Slide 'Em Up
description: A cute puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit!

name: Lost In Space: The Adventure Game
description: "Danger! Danger!" Play as Will Robinson, Dr. Smith and Robot in this 3D, point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space. Explore treacherous environments, outwit classic Villains and solve countless puzzles and mysteries to rescue your fellow crew members of the Jupiter 2.

name: Flower Knight Hu Die
description: A hybrid visual novel-RPG where you take on the role of Hú Dié, one of the city's (unwilling) resident magical girls as she looks for the truth behind her best friend's disappearance. A sapphic magical girl romance set in the solarpunk city of Yánghuāchéng!

name: Horror Night
description: Horror Night is an Online Multiplayer Coop Third/First person asymmetric horror adventure game. You have to escape the monster, in a procedurally generated scenario by solving puzzles and finding items, alongside your teammates. Characters can be customized through cosmetics and skins!

name: DIY Tour: Indie Rock Simulator
description: Make a band, tour Canada, get famous? A resource management music tycoon/simulation game. Manage your band, make choices in random events, play concerts, and build your reputation.

name: Platformory
description: Platformory is a 2D platformer with minimalistic graphics, in which you not only have to prove your platforming but also your memory skills.

name: Timeline
description: Timeline is a turn-based strategy game where you can play through the human history from stone age to modern times. In the game you command wide range of units, make them collect resources and build buildings, towns and cities, explore the map and meet other players controlled by AI.

name: Gunner
description: Help the gunner destroy the enemy castle. By placing the right platforms in the right place, you can direct the cannonball to the desired position. Just set the cannon and fire!

name: Cyclone
description: Cyclone is a puzzling first-person action-platformer from the creator of the hit Portal modification, Blue Portals. Solve a series of perplexing puzzles by placing gravity-bending vortexes in the world. Launch objects, redirect projectiles, and fling yourself across the room to reach the exit!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Iveco Bus Pack
description: This Bus Simulator 21: Bus Pack includes three new buses and interiors licensed from renowned manufacturer Iveco Bus, including Crealis, Crossway LE, and Eway by Heuliez.

name: Planet Zoo: Wetlands Animal Pack
description: Where there is water, there is life! Discover the richness of the wetlands with the Planet Zoo: Wetlands Animal Pack and embrace eight diverse new species.

name: Garage: Vamp
description: A visual novel by the esteemed smut artist hasselnut - garage:VAMP's premise is simple, you've got a hunky vampire living in your garage who is trying to fuck your wife. Will true love prevail, or will deep repressed desires become too much to bear?

name: PixelGround: Expansion Pack
description: Additional characters Noel, Rakum, Kyosun, Noah, and Rogen are available.

name: Tokyo Detectives: Case 03
description: Case 03 Complete : Blood on Sailor Uniform

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Dark Horse
description: Includes: Hero unlock (Eve Woods), the Urban Shadow outfit, Zombie Eliminator MP40 skin and 700 crowns.

name: TVG Journey
description: Voxel-like medieval escort game.

name: Prospector
description: A colorful, sci-fi adventure about survival crafting and exploration in a randomized open world.

name: 2080 Apocalypse
description: 2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.

name: The President
description: The President is a management / political simulation game where you play as the president of one of the available countries. Shape your country and meet the expectations of your people to be re-elected in the next elections.

name: Deliverance
description: Hunt...Craft,,, and survive the wild west. A survival PVP extravaganza! Hunt Others, Craft your own custom bullets and bombs, Search for bosses and level up your outfit to survive the Wild west in this unique western survival game!!

name: Shuuchakueki
description: There are three stories about departure and separation, each focusing on a different heroine of Air.

name: Phantom Thief Mew's Secret Prima
description: In an unexpected turn of events, Miu becomes a phantom thief. As a phantom thief, you have to carry out various mission along with her childhood friend, Chinatsu. To complete your mission,you have to sneak into the targetted location and dodge the obstacles in the way to proceed.

name: Ultimate Muscle Roller Championship
description: Take part in an incredible racing championship, among the most pumped up guys from all over the world.

name: Slot Shots Pinball Collection
description: Slot Shots Pinball Collection Early Access Coming Soon! Early access will include the Slot Shots casino themed table and the Bass Hunter fishing themed table! Purchasing early access will also include two future tables as they are developed and released-and included in the early access price!

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Fantastic Quests and Where to Find Them
description: Unlock rare and powerful items by helping who is in need. This is the way of the hero. Nothing is done for free!

name: Racing the Gods: Beyond Horizons
description: The most epic race of all times is about to start. You have been selected as one of the drivers representing earth. It’s race of live and death as only the fastest will survive. Do you have what it takes?

name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare 2
description: Take control of Maria, a girl with Ukrainian roots. Explore the open world, complete "GTA-like" quests, your friends and handlers to earn points and qualify for the main "Call of Senpai" tournament. and your friends and handlers to score points and qualify for the main Call of Senpai tournament.

name: Mojito the Cat
description: Mojito the Cat will push your space vision to the limit, use the logic to find the shortest path to the exit. Rotate the pieces to reach all coins, get the fish scrape and go to the gate to jump to the next level

name: The Expedition
description: "The Expedition" is a first person open world survival game based on a remote island in the Bermuda Triangle. Try to survive as long as you can. Gather resources to build more and more gear and discover all hidden weapons, treasures and locations.

name: Star Math: Interstellar Rogue 2
description: Star Math is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game where you use your maths to defeat the enemy! Humanity is fighting a robotic threat from space of its own making! You will fight through a huge 100 area procedural saga map to defeat 9 boss ships, before you can fight the mainframe in the final battle!

name: Mothergunship: Forge
description: Craft. Shoot. Die. Repeat. Forge absurdly powerful guns and fight through the belly of a metal alien monstrosity in this VR FPS roguelite follow up to Mothergunship. Wanna build a rocket-firing-shotgun or a toxic spike-ball-launcher? Unleash your inner mad scientist, then take on the Mothergunship.

name: Macheesmo: The Animated Series - The Game
description: The Classic 1991 Platformer comes to Steam!

name: O.A.C: World Begins
description: Are you a leader? Once you convince your nation you are their leader, it will be time to show the world your own political, people management and military strategy skills. O.A.C aims to be a breath of fresh air in the grand strategy genre that will inspire its own kind of videogames!

name: 3D Puzzle: Alchemist House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: 3 Days: Ghosts of War
description: In the heart of the Afghan wilderness, amidst the chaos of war, you awaken to the stark reality of your mission: three days to navigate the perilous landscape, uncover hidden truths, and confront the ghosts of the past. 3 Days: Ghosts of War beckons you into a realm where time is your greatest adversary, and every decision carries weight.

name: The Valley
description: A fantasy based, RPG with magic, story, potion crafting, puzzles, platforming, story, and more!

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Oceans Campaign
description: Unleash dastardly chaos as a brand new Genius - the ecological mastermind Polar! Along with a frosty new Arctic Lair, story Campaign and an equally chilling Doomsday device.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Wolf Predator
description: Become the master Xenomorph hunter and play as the most lethal foe your enemies will face in combat. This DLC pack includes the Wolf Predator premium class.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5 - Legends Pack Vol. 1
description: Relive the excitement of the past with the riders and track contained in the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

name: Shapebreaker
description: A fusion of tower defense games and roguelike deckbuilders. Use your cards to build towers and to upgrade them in unique ways. Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle. Break the shapes before they break you!

name: Space Voyager
description: Space voyager is a solo action/puzzle game with simple and effective gameplay. Swipe your way through space, but keep an eye of the fuel gauge !

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged
description: Hardcore survival RPG with non-linear story that lets you play as a young medieval soldier who over the course of battles and adventures becomes the most formidable and respected knight of his era. Or, if he’s not lucky enough, perishes in the chaos of the Hundred Years' War.

name: Mr. Prepper: Animal Farm
description: Take care of the animals, repair the farm’s facilities, learn fishing, explore the new areas, adopt a dog, get to the bottom of the Agency’s special interest in the farm and discover the mystery lurking from above! Use what you learn on the farm in your shelter and breed your own animals!

name: Mad World: Age of Darkness
description: Mad World stays true to the classic MMORPGs but with unique art and grotesqueness. Fight along side your friends to take down formidable enemies, or fight against your friends to test your skills in a world full of fear, despair, and madness. This is Mad World.

name: Slayer
description: Slayer is a fast paced combat intensive survive and thrive full throttle experience! Combat waves of enemies and make fast paced decisions to build your power! Get ready to slay hordes of enemies with just a click & swipe!

name: 1001 Jigsaw Legends of Mystery 3
description: Solve incredible puzzles with 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 3. 500 photos to prove the existence of magic!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Level Creator
description: The Sonic the Hedgehog Level Creator was an official flash Sonic game on the PlaySEGA Website.

name: Sonic XS
description: Sonic XS is a Flash game that was available on the official 4Kids website. You play as "Sonic Xs", and have to get to the end of the level while collecting rings and defeating enemies.

name: Shadow XS
description: Shadow XS is a Flash game that was available on the official 4Kids website. You play as "Shadow Xs", and have to get to the end of the level while collecting rings and defeating enemies. It is a version of Sonic XS, with a different level layout.

name: Sonic the Sketchhog
description: Sonic the Sketchhog is a 2D sidescroller platform game for mobile phones. The game features Sonic in a hand-drawn doodle style, reminiscent of Sonic 3 concept art, defeating badniks like Crabmeat as he advances his way though a drawn level.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode Metal
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode Metal is a free downloadable "Lock-On" part of the episodic game Sonic the Hedgehog 4, released along side of Episode II. It enables any player who owns both Episode I and Episode II on the same console to play Episode Metal, thereby acting very similar to the Lock-On Technology pioneered by Sonic and Knuckles. Episode Metal explains the backstory to Metal Sonic's return in Episode II and also serves to connect Sonic 4 to Sonic the Hedgehog CD, befitting the latter game's recent re-release on digital download services.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Boukensha-tachi
description: This new Konosuba game is going to be a sequel of the dungeon-crawling JRPG Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukenshatachi, originally released in 2019 for PS4 and PS Vita.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Boukensha-tachi: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town Special
description: The long-awaited brand new entry in the original farm/life simulation franchise, known in Japan as Bokujo Monogatari, makes its debut on Nintendo Switch, bringing players more freedom than ever before to shape an untamed wilderness and customize their farm down to the very tile. A new cast of marriage candidates, a town that grows and thrives along with your farm, and a request system highlight the new features, all while retaining the core elements of the STORY OF SEASONS series. Finding Earth Sprites while exploring your farmland may lead you to mysterious, fantastical lands such as gardens where the seasons never change, an island in the sky, or even the inside of a volcano!

name: The Quarry: Deluxe Edition
description:
As the sun sets on the last day of summer camp, the teenage counselors of Hackett’s Quarry throw a party to celebrate. No kids. No adults. No rules. Things quickly take a turn for the worse.

Enjoy some extra teen horror flair with The Quarry - Deluxe Edition!

This Edition includes:

- The Quarry Full Game
- Deluxe Bonus Content Pack: ‘80s-themed character outfits, instant access to the Death Rewind system, Gorefest Movie Mode option, and Horror History Visual Filter Pack

name: Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dana - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition Includes:

- Ys VIII: Lacrimosa Of Dana PS5 Game
- Mini Art Collection
- Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dan, Select Soundtrack

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 3 - Deluxe Edition
description:
Prinny is back at it again, dood! Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3: La Pucelle: Ragnarok / Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure brings you two foundational titles in one!

Discover the world of La Pucelle: Ragnarok as it makes its North American debut. This action-packed RPG is loaded with tons of extra content including new scenarios, new recruits, and a whole gang of DLC characters in addition to a new voice cast, new music, and quick travel!

Dive back into your NIS roots and experience a game that laid the foundation for the beloved Disgaea series with Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure. Sharper graphics and updated image optimization bring this classic title into the present!

Plus, each physical copy includes the soundtrack and art book at retail. Experience a part of NIS history with this delightful combo pack!

Features:
• Overflowing with New Content: La Pucelle is back with tons of new content including the Overlord Prier scenario. You can also recruit Laharl, Etna, Flonne, and Prinny to join your adventures.
• Where it All Began: The return of the original Rhapsody strategy RPG from the PS1 now has sharper graphics and image optimization options to mimic CRT.
• Exclusives Included: The physical NSW release includes both a soundtrack and an art book!
• Extra DLC characters such as Rozalin, Cornet, Hero Prinny, and Elly are included as well.

What's Included:
• Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3 Game
• Anthology Official CD Soundtrack
• Compendium Softcover Art Book
• Collector's Box

name: Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory / Fallen Legion Revenants - Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory / Fallen Legion Revenants game, Deluxe Digital Soundtrack (download code), and “Fallen Legion Compendium” Mini Art Book

name: Ookami Kakushi
description: Ookami Kakushi is a horror visual novel developed by guyzware, Konami and Ryukishi07.

name: Number Days Sim Date
description: Number Days Sim Date is a dating simulation game made by Pacthesis. Released on December 1, 2012.

name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Advance
description: Mobile device port of the Game Boy Advance game under the same name.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: The port of Sonic the Hedgehog for mobile phones (running J2ME).

name: Kingdom Days Sim Date
description: Kingdom Days is set in a kingdom neighboring Wonderland and was released on 5th September 2010. It is about a princess named Rose who is forced to flee her kingdom with her elf servant, Lewis, when it is attacked by a neighboring kingdom. They wander through a forest till they see on a castle and knock on its door and meet a king who will not let them stay unless Rose marries him in 30 days.

name: Sway
description: A short experimental bullet hell. Traverse a dubious reality. Talk to manifestations of your own insecurities. Avoid bullets like you avoid your real-life problems.

name: The Haunted: Hells Reach - The Fog
description: THE FOG - Welcome to DLC 2!The second brand new full level of THHR. The testers were excited about the brand new level and you will be too - so get the achievement "SALVAGED FOG" on all difficulty levels.

name: Sakura Angels
description: From the creators of Sakura Succubus comes an angelic love comedy!

name: Here Comes the Wiji Waji
description: Here Comes The Wiji Waji is a multiplayer survival game, where several creatures went to a Playground, and one of them is the Wiji Waji, who is blood thirsty.

name: Mini Motor Racing X
description: Jump into a nitro fuelled world where little cars mean BIG fun! Spanning across reclaimed ruins and scorched outbacks through to rain soaked docks and sun-kissed tropical islands - Mini Motor Racing X will take you on a micro driving journey across the globe like no other.

name: Luna
description:
A Bird's peaceful summer slumber is disturbed by the majestic call of a mysterious Owl. Enticed to swallow the last piece of the waning Moon, Bird is blown far from its Golden Gate home.

Unscramble celestial puzzles and create miniature musical worlds. Re-awaken shadowy forests and bring life back to sparkling lakes. Discover hidden creatures, help the Bird reunite the fragmented Moon... and find its way home.

Brought to you by Funomena’s uniquely diverse team of veteran developers (Journey, Flower, Boom Blox, The Sims 2) Luna is an interactive fable about learning by the light of unexpected mistakes.

Solve celestial puzzles to unlock each level's tree, plant and animal spirits.
Place, customize and interact with them in miniature, musical terrariums.
Bring each world to life, revealing Austin Wintory’s haunting, enchanting score.

name: Hentai Uni
description: Hentai Uni - a puzzle game that can be played with one hand.

name: Zig Zag Tilt
description: Tilt your device to weave through the endless zig zag!

name: Hidden Object: Mystery Mathematics - Mysterious Numbers
description:
Hello, my name is Pifagor, I present a great mathematicians. Residents of the mathematical world have long been suffering from not understood phenomena and terrible unexplained. We have been waiting for help from a specialist in such matters.
Test your abilities in intricate puzzles that will guide you to mysterious places throughout the world. This game with its charming characters, a gripping storyline and plenty of puzzles will become a real present for both experienced and unsophisticated fans of adventure games and hidden objects search games!

name: Bravo Soccer
description:
It's time to play soccer (football).
In particular, Bravo Soccer has many balls to kick into both goals.
The key rule to be able to play this game is to protect the opposing team's balls and then to pass my team's balls through the goal.
(= you can score goals in both goal posts)
You can tilt the device to move the goalkeeper.

name: Dark Woods Haunted Quest: Hidden Objects Game
description: Join the Creepy, Fun as you journey into the Dark Haunted Woods to locate precious Magical Potions.

name: Flight 787: Advanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Mirror Land
description:
Summon the most powerful Fingermon and save the world from the NS Fingermons.
A Mirror Land exists in a dimension different from ours, where Fingermons live.
People called Connectors can summon the Mirror Land Fingermons to our world.
Then one day, someone began to exploit the Fingermons to plunge the world into chaos.
As modern weapons were incapable of harming the magically-protected Fingermons,
Good Connectors, including you, began summon Fingermons to rise up against the evil forces!

name: Hero Mages
description: Hero Mages is a turn-based tactical strategy fantasy game that combines the fun of role playing games (RPGs) with competitive and cooperative cross-platform multiplayer gameplay. Designed and developed by a single individual driven to share his passion for gaming with the world, Hero Mages also blends the best elements of tabletop miniature and collectible card games.

name: Sudden Death Air Hockey
description: Three, 90 second periods of air hockey, if tied at the end, you play Sudden Death!

name: Missileman
description:
Missileman is a high-speed, vertically scrolling 2D shooter. You are a man on a missile! Shoot enemies down with missiles. Earn EXP and upgrade your missile. Can you beat all 16 stages across four Zones to ultimately defeat The Eye?
Dodge walls and obstacles that scroll by at ultrasonic speeds while still aiming carefully to target each enemy, one by one. Missileman is a game all about speed and precision!

name: Cursed Castilla
description:
In Cursed Castilla, one takes the role of Don Ramiro, a knight appointed by King Alphonse VI, to fight and banish the evil invading the lands of Tolomera.
Don Ramiro will face mouras, Ojáncanos, Nuberus and Malismos: creatures from the European folklore, as well as from chivalric romances such as Amadís de Gaula. For that, one will use a different range of weapons to defeat the enemies, in a pure classic arcade action style.

name: Game Center Club
description: Game Center Club is a simulation game in which you will manage a game center.

name: Rainbow Story Global
description: Start a relaxing adventure across a gorgeous open world with friends and fellows, cute pets, and mounts!

name: Ini
description: At the beginning there was only darkness. Shadows dominated life but light dropped into the dark and a complex world evolved.

name: Eliss Infinity
description: Use your fingers to control all the planets, fuse planets together until they become giant, or split them into halves until they become tiny, you're in charge of this reactive universe. Just don't let different colors touch!

name: Unstoppable
description: Unstoppable is a furious post-apocalyptic truck racing game where your goal is to survive an explosive highway of mad raiders hell-bent on your destruction. Weapons at your disposal include machine guns, mounted spikes, circular saws, flamethrowers, miniguns and minions to turn your truck into an explosive death machine!

name: RBL
description: Just don't skip a beat.

name: Helidroid 2: Helicopter R/C
description: Helidroid 3D is a realistic 3D game, which let you control a little RC helicopter in a house. This is the second part of Helidroid 3D.

name: Oh No! It's An Alien Invasion: Turret Alert
description: Stay on high alert in this action packed game that's easy to learn but hard to master! Aim your weapon and tap to shoot as you make your way through S.W.E.E.T's secret hideout! Swipe to build combos and knock out multiple aliens.

name: Jellyflug Micro Adventures
description:
Welcome to the Micro World of Jellyflug!
Run, jump and battle your way through the micro-world of bacteria.

name: Fluid SE
description:
Fluid SE is a thrilling time-trial racer mixed with the arcade gameplay of Pac-Man, brought to you by Radiangames, creator of Inferno+, JoyJoy, Super Crossfire, and more. Speed through the mazes to collect the dots, find the optimal path, and avoid the swarms of spectres.

In Fluid SE, zoom around in 10 new levels. Try to finish all the levels in the shortest time possible!

name: Dangerous
description: Dangerous is a Console-Quality.

name: Magic Tower Story
description: Magic Tower Story: The Origin of the Magic Ring

name: Monster Truck Soccer
description: Score as many goals as you can driving your Monster Truck.

name: Boy and the Seagull
description: Join the boy's journey to the Seagull Island. In this hand-drawn children book your child can meet the seagull, octopus and the giant stingray, swim with the fish and visit the mysterious Seagull Island.

name: New York Simulator Air Racing and The Statue of Liberty
description: Hi, Welcome to New-York Simulator Air Racing in which you can sit at the controls of various aircraft, flying on a variety of routes. You play as a pilot ace, but do not think it will fly for you. Your task is to collect all stars without damaging the aircraft. Everything is in your hands, fly!

name: TIS-100P
description: TIS-100 is an open-ended programming game by Zachtronics, the creators of SpaceChem and Infinifactory, in which you rewrite corrupted code segments to repair the TIS-100 and unlock its secrets. It’s the assembly language programming game you never asked for!

name: Neon Beats
description:
Beat your best scores in Neon Beats, a 2D platformer game with rhythm based levels!
You just entered an abstract world and embody a cube moving on a white line.
A relaxing and catchy music starts to play along with colourful shining neon lights all around.

name: FPAH: Foul Play Air Hockey
description: FPAH is a player-versus-player air hockey you can play as foul as you want.

name: Vertical Golf
description: Golf turned on it's side. Aim your sights up and try to reach the hole in as few strokes as possible.

name: Raid Manager
description:
Raid Manager is a 3D real-time Hack and Healing RPG.
Play the role of a Healer and Raid leader with a Tank and three damage dealers to explore unique dungeons wrapped in a darkness.

name: Football Manager 2020 Mobile
description:
Manage your football club, your way this season in Football Manager 2020 Mobile – the fast-track to footballing greatness.
Effortlessly build your dream squad, win titles and feel the rush as you battle your way to the very top of the game, wherever and whenever you want. Featuring more than 60 leagues from 21 of the top footballing nations, will you challenge for domestic glory or opt for an adventure abroad?

name: Side Bullet
description:
Side Bullet is a free-to-play, side scroll online shooting game.
Choose your cartel and use special skills and weapons to battle monsters and other players to be the last one standing!

name: Nekodancer
description: Nekodancer is a multiplayer dance game with cats!

name: Neosaurs
description: Neosaurs is a multiplayer, online role-playing game where you enter the forgotten world of Sauria and embark on a quest to defend the world from the creatures of the Dark. Featuring multiple classes, skills, dungeons, and gear, Neosaurs is the premiere MMORPG on all social networks.

name: Gallery Fake
description: Gallery Fake is a mystery adventure visual novel based on the manga with the same name, in which you play as Fujita Reiji and must solve the mysterious events surrounding a few priceless pieces of artwork.

name: Race With Ryan: Surprise Track Pack
description: Treat your little Ryan Fan’s to even more hours of fun with their favourite YouTuber in his very own video game, Race With Ryan! In this whole new Track Pack, your little one can travel to the iconic route of Route 66 and the slippery slope of Icy Land - See who will slide into first place!

name: Anno 1800: Gold Edition Year 4
description: Improve your experience in Anno 1800 with the Gold Edition Year 4, including the Season 4 Pass and the Deluxe Pack.

name: Anno 1800: Complete Edition Year 4
description:
Unlock the entire Anno 1800 experience with the Complete Edition Year 4, which includes the following digital content:

Season 1 Pass with three DLCs: Sunken Treasures, Botanica, and The Passage.
Season 2 Pass with three DLCs: Seat of Power, Bright Harvest, and Land of Lions.
Season 3 Pass with three DLCs: Docklands, Tourist Season, and The High Life.
Season 4 Pass, which includes the next three DLCs: Seeds of Change, Empire of the Skies, and New World Rising.
The Deluxe Pack, containing the Anarchist AI character, the soundtrack, a digital art book, and more!

name: Deck of Ashes: Tome of Dimensions
description: Tome of Dimensions adds new playable character with unique storyline, 100+ new cards to experiment with, and, of course, a variety of new deadly enemies.

name: Aqua Energizer
description:
Help Nemo collect the red flashing balls into the energizer. Jump into it and get the code for the next level.
Beware of enemies, but be wise; you may want to keep them alive. Nemo can't live without oxygen. So hurry up!

name: Par 1 Golf 5
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 5! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The fifth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: iBowl Deluxe
description: Real Bowling in a Virtual Alley: Swing your iPhone or iPod touch like a real bowling ball and watch the ball smash into the pins on your screen. You can improve your game while waiting for the bus! Get rewarded for each strike and spare and spend your new pippins to customize your game experience. Unlock exciting new alleys, bowling balls and outfits.

name: BMX Streets
description: Ready to hit the streets? BMX Streets brings the essence of street riding to your fingertips. Experience the next generation of BMX gaming with realistic physics, meaningful customization and a massive open world. Practice, experiment and explore to find your own unique style and master the streets.

name: Truck Go
description:
TruckGo - Deliver goods to the marketplace with your truck. Collect coins to get advanced trucks, wheels and vip cards.
You will need to get from one place to another without dropping too much from your truck. You will get a precise number of pieces you carry and a precise number of pieces that is required. The more you bring, the more score and coins you get.

name: Nemesis
description: Nemesis is a theoretical brown dwarf star in orbit around our own sun, which may even have its own planetary system. Play 25 different power-ups, for all kinds of ways to smite your foes in this 3D space shooter for the iPhone, iPad and Apple TV.

name: SimpleRockets
description: Design your own rocket ships. Blast off into space. Explore the solar system. See if you have what it takes to be a rocket scientist. Choose and connect parts together to build rocket ships. You can fly through the intense atmosphere of Venus, or you can take advantage of the low gravity of Mercury. Whip around the sun and launch yourself out to the far reaches of the solar system.

name: RPG Chrome Wolf
description:
Introducing a serious fantasy RPG filled with the dramatic stories of soldiers! Kruz leads the independent mobile unit Chrom Wolf.
They devote themselves to being at the forefront for the Freedom Fighters.
Follow them on their journey as they seek revenge, atonement, justice, and ideals...
=7 is a unique and satisfying Dice game! Simply pair two dice to equal seven. Avoid mismatching dice and collect stars and unlock new dice!

name: 2XL ATV Offroad
description: Interested in extreme sports? Catch some sick air and combo as many tricks as you can for big points with our innovative new stunt system. Learn to back flip while tricking for extra point multipliers in 2XL ATV Offroad, an action-packed racing game with freestyle levels and more!

name: Monster Stunts
description: Monster Stunts - A stunt monster truck racing game. Drive the monster truck through the tracks as fast as you can to get rewards. Rotate 360 degrees to get more coins. Please be careful, don’t hit the ground, then would crash the monster trucks. Get more rewards to earn more coins. Unlock more monster trucks in shop.

name: Rubicon
description: Play as Paula Cole, a food safety officer for a multinational corporation, who gradually takes on the role of whistleblower. Depending on your choices, you will be confronted with different situations inspired by real facts, the whole scenario being based on a journalistic work, coordinated with the online newspaper Mediapart. You'll discuss with multiple protagonists to investigate and find out your truth. From the first discoveries to the revelations to the press, you will make choices that will have an impact on what happens next.

name: Football Management RPG
description:
FMRPG is not about comparing statistics for players to see who is 'better', or playing an unrealistic and flawed transfer system.
It is about dealing with the personalities of your players, your staff and the media effectively in order to motivate them and deliver success on the pitch. Your decisions will affect your clubs harmony, attitude and tactics, which in turn will affect the outcome of your matches and results.

name: Help the Cats to Go Home ! - Use the Cats Food to Help Them !
description: Help the cats get home in this adorable strategy game by luring them with food! But remember, time is short and so is the food!

name: Maximus 2
description: Maximus 2 is a fantasy beat-em-up (brawler) that focuses on crunchy and satisfying combat. We captured the spirit of some of the best classic beat-em-ups, melding them into one memorable experience. Fight solo or with up to 4 players cooperative multiplayer!

name: Supersonic HD
description: Race on tracks created from your own music! Supersonic HD is an adrenaline-charged, music-driven 3D ride game. Blaze through radiant neon racing circuits at ever faster speeds, accompanied by electronic beats from Finnish artist collective Kitkaliitto. The ultimate challenge comes in the 30-second Blitz mode with speed boosts, time extends and other special collectibles.

name: Axolotl Stars
description:
The axolotls came out of the water to play. Be an axolotl and join the endless fun.
Race other axolotls and avoid an abundance of hazardous obstacles to become the axolotl star. Run through the chaotic levels and reach the finish line first.

name: Re:Lief - Shinai Naru Anata he: For Switch
description: This is the sister title of the visual novel "Tryment - Ima wo Kaetai to Negau Anata he-", which shares the same world view and game characters. This title combines science fiction, suspense, friendship, love and other diversified themes.

name: Adios Amigos: Galactic Explorers
description: Team up with your friends & family and explore the peculiar universe of ADIOS Amigos. A game with serious astrophysics in a comic setting for 1-4 players. Explore solar systems and discover planets, space stations, aliens, and artifacts. Improvise fuel efficient trajectories to keep your rusty ship running (and you might see your home planet once again). Toy with accurate and delightful space physics. Break into a space station with an asteroid. Tow a sofa into a black hole. Normal stuff.

name: Black Metal Man 2
description: It's 1994 in a small nihilistic town in Norway. Black Metal is still an underground movement, grim, brutal and dark as hell. There's a festival coming up, the "Kriegfest 94" and you need to be there! You will need fast reaction skills, a blastbeat tapping finger, an ear for extreme heavy metal music, and a device with loud volume.

name: Casual Coins
description: Welcome to Casual Coins. Collect virtual in-game coins for fun in this simple plinko-style arcade game, featuring a satisfying coin-collecting experience with calming gameplay.

name: Refraction
description: Refraction is an addicting puzzle game using lasers and prisms. Use mirrors and prisms to split or combine colored lasers, while interacting with various environmental objects. Refraction offers distinct and creative levels, great graphics, a fantastic UI, and multiple solutions to each level for casual and intense players alike. With hours of playtime and various solutions, this game is sure to keep you entertained. Let's hope your logic skills are up to the task!

name: Shift Shaft
description: Manipulate your player and the board by rotating it and clearing groups of 3 or more rocks. Collect and spend gems to upgrade your stats and unlock over 30 different items during each run. Go up against 5 unique enemies and the gem-eating spider to uncover the world beneath the mines.

name: Rhetoric Public Speaking Game
description:
Public speaking. The mere thought of it can set hearts pounding! And yet, being able to communicate one’s ideas in public is an important and sought-after skill.
Rhetoric is an educational game that will help you improve your public speaking skills and have a great time in the process.

name: Go Rally
description: With loads of tracks, cars, a career mode, multiplayer time challenges and an awesome track creator, Go Rally is the only rally game you'll ever need! Draw a line on your screen, tap the 'race' icon, and instantly drive your very own track! Add hills, bridges, checkpoints, trackside banners, houses and terrain - create the circuit of your dreams, then share on-line and challenge your friends, and the world, to beat your times.

name: Maracaibo Digital
description:
Play as an adventurer and sail around the Caribbean! Upgrade your ship, complete quests, and engage in combat. Every card you buy will unlock new abilities and bonuses to outwit your opponents.
The board changes every round, and your strategy will have to keep up. Will you play slowly, buying as many cards as you can? Or will you race to the final space to catch your opponents by surprise?

name: Pyramid Solitaire Asia Pro
description:
The card game consists in clearing the board by taking a card that is one above or below the card on the deck.
Among the 320 levels available to play, you would find several missions as well a wild card, that you would be able to use any time replacing the card that you need.
